DhkDriver - Class in com.dhk.main
This class is the main driver for Display Hot Keys that starts the model, view, and controller on the AWT event dispatch thread.

This class is the primary model of Display Hot Keys.

This class utilizes the Windows CLI to communicate with the SetDisplay program to set the given display mode and DPI scale percentage.
